What we do


PersonalData.IO is a free web service aimed at helping people access their personal data.

We think this access is essential for a more transparent, fair and useful internet.

We address requests on your behalf, but always ask for your data to be sent directly to you.

We aim to leverage collective experience in addressing and formulating requests to hep individuals.


Uber

Get access to all your Uber personal data, including your individual scores, geolocation data, monitored battery status, etc.

Get your Uber data!.

Coursera

Get all your Coursera personal data, including individual homework grade, keystroke biometrics, etc.

Get your Coursera data!.

Internet retargeting

Get all your personal data from leading internet retargeting firms that you have never heard about, such as Criteo, Rubicon or Turn. From a few cookies, track all the behind-the-scenes bidding that took place for your attention.

Get your Uber data!.

Reddit

Get all your personal data from Reddit, including non-public information, advertising profile, etc

Get your Reddit data!.
